original_title: Route 66: Marathon Tour: Chicago to L.A.
overview: Take a trip across the country and back in time and re-discover the America of years gone by on the historic Route 66. Called the Main Street of America, it linked east and west for nearly 60 memorable years and became part of our national folklore in the process. More than 2400 miles of roadside diners, small towns, tepee-shaped motels and frozen custard stands helped thread the fabric of America.
title: Route 66: Marathon Tour: Chicago to L.A.
